alert.note: Alert for Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:18PM EDT until May 21 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Orleans County in northeastern Vermont... Northwestern Essex County in northeastern Vermont... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 618 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Black Island, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Newport City, Derby Center, Newport Town, Derby Line Village, Morgan, Warren Gore, Newport Center, Averys Gore, Holland, Derby, Norton, Averill, Warners Grant, Derby Center Village, Coventry, Lewis, Lemington, Charleston, Troy and Canaan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
